overview: Velvet Revolver is an American hard rock supergroup consisting of former Guns N' Roses members Slash, Duff McKagan, and Matt Sorum, alongside Dave Kushner formerly of punk band Wasted Youth and Stone Temple Pilots vocalist Scott Weiland.  Rock Am Ring Nürburgring – Nürburg, Germany. 3rd June 2007
title: Velvet Revolver - Rock am Ring
